entry.title: dotnet/efcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-01-04
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • How to convert from IModel to RelationalModel and presserve annotations EFC #29980
  • Typo in XML documentation in EntityFrameworkQueryableExtensions #29978
  • EF Core 7 Scaffold-DbContext pluralizer incorrectly removes .ToTable() in many-to-many relationship #29977
  • ExecuteUpdate throws exception when entity has an autoinclude #29976
  • InsufficientInformationToIdentifyElementOfCollectionJoin error with join of join selection in queries with union #29975

Closed

  • Migration file is generated with same content #29879
    7.0.x
  • The host was aborted exception when adding new migration #29923
  • Migration trying to make foreign key to a synonym #29914
  • How to get rid of warning: The decimal property 'id' is part of a key on entity type 'SampleTable'? #29912
  • Howto update auto-implemented (by convention) many to many in Entity Framework Core 6 (.Net 6)? #29901
  • FirstOrDefault on DateTime column projection throws SqlException "The conversion of a varchar data type to a datetime data type resulted in an out-of-range valued" when sequence contains 0 items #29893
  • Why Collection navigations should never be null ? #29892
  • Using same type as nested owned property cause "Attempted to update or delete an entity that does not exist in the store" in disconnected state. #29877
  • Using `ModelBuilder.Entity` in `DbContext.OnModelCreating` for an owned entity type results in a `System.InvalidOperationException` #29869
  • Relations in ef c not mapped in sqlite provider #29844
  • Use case-insensitive key comparisons by convention when underlying database is case-insenstive #27526
    8.0.0
  • Allow value converters to change the DbType #24771
    8.0.0
  • Relational mapping hints are lost when applied to existing converter #29966
    8.0.0
  • HasMaxLength(-1) should force maximum length #29627
    8.0.0
  • empty resultset using JSON_VALUE + JSON_QUERY sql server #29885

PullRequests

Created

  • Fix grammar in XML doc for ToQueryString #29979

Merged

  • [release/7.0] Revert shared columns validation breaking change #29867
    Servicing-approved, 7.0.3
  • [release/7.0] Avoid circular dependency for unique indexes with null values #29921
    Servicing-approved, 7.0.3
  • [release/7.0] Update discriminator columns when PK-to-PK dependent type is changed #29920
    Servicing-approved, 7.0.3
  • [release/7.0] Avoid infinite loop during foreign key discovery #29850
    Servicing-approved, 7.0.3
  • [release/7.0] Allow underscores in identifiers again #29822
    Servicing-approved, 7.0.3
  • [release/7.0] Include table name for overrides in snapshot. #29820
    Servicing-approved, 7.0.3
  • [release/7.0] Avoid redundant looping in property metadata #29807
    Servicing-approved, 7.0.3
  • [release/7.0] Reset query tracking behavior correctly if set on DbContextOptions #29797
    Servicing-approved, 7.0.3
  • [release/7.0] Fix making column required on SQL Server with idempotent migrations #29784
    Servicing-approved, 7.0.3
  • [release/7.0] Allow shared columns with nullable value converters #29778
    Servicing-approved, 7.0.3
  • [release/7.0] Scaffolding: Fix missing HasForeignKey when principal key is an alternate key #29731
    Servicing-approved, 7.0.3
  • [release/7.0] Use correct parameter in query based on type mapping #29724
    Servicing-approved, 7.0.3
  • [release/7.0] Support entities with owned types in ExecuteUpdate setter property lambda #29723
    Servicing-approved, 7.0.3
  • [release/7.0] Fix bug where a non-sproc command comes before a sproc command #29722
    Servicing-approved, 7.0.3
  • [release/7.0] Fix SQL Server bulk insert edge case (#29669) #29717
    Servicing-approved, 7.0.3
  • Use raw string literals in scaffolding tests #29965
    auto-merge
  • Use case-insensitive string comparisons by default on SQL Server #29955
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0' => 'main' #29974
    area-infrastructure, auto-merge, type-merge forward :fast_forward:
  • Fix relational mapping hints and add DbType #29967
  • HasMaxLength(-1) sets unbounded max length #29959
  • Don't proxy navigations not configured for lazy loading #29957
  • Update branding to 6.0.14 #29972
  • Update branding to 7.0.3 #29973
    area-infrastructure, tell-mode

Updated

  • Working implementation of precompiled queries #29949
  • [release/7.0] Scaffolding: Fix code for EF6 many-to-many pattern #29793
    Servicing-approved, 7.0.3
  • [release/7.0] Scaffolding: Handle FK on keyless entity type #29779
    Servicing-approved, 7.0.3
